review_text: If you want a frustrating failed experience trying to make ice cream, buy this ICE-20.  The most critical part, the paddle, is made of pure junk plastic. It is as strong as an ice cream stick and breaks just as easily.Cuisinart has no business marketing such inferior trash to the public.They have sullied their reputation with the ICE-20.
summary: If you want junk, buy this Cuisinart ice cream "maker"
product_name: Cuisinart ICE-20 Automatic 1-1/2-Quart Ice Cream Maker, White
